ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending games on weekdays to potentially find lower ticket prices. Group discounts may be available for larger parties. Keep an eye out for promotional offers.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. Utilize reputable secondary marketplaces that offer buyer protection. Be cautious of buying tickets from sellers outside the venue.
